title: Paul Heading | Portfolio | Full Stack Designer
description: Welcome to my online home: I'm a Full Stack Designer. I design and build with the React.js and Vue.js frameworks.

about.title: Paul Heading | About | Full Stack Designer
about.description: I built this site using the React.js framework, GSAP for animations, Netlify for form handling and several external api's. I use Trello as my CMS and pull data from Spotify, Medium, Github and TeamTreehouse.
